overview: Chris Ward is an enigma. He travels around and rips as hard as anyone on the tour, but he does his traveling and ripping quietly. A documentary on Chris was long overdue. The documentary-style movie that features Wardo at his best. Most of the footage is raw and medium quality, but that fits Ward well; he's a working man's hero.  Locations: Hawaii, Mexico - Puerto Escondido, Tahiti, Indonesia, South Africa, California, Europe, South America, Australia. Music: Sublime, White Zombie, Youth Brigade
title: Psychoward
